text: Andrzej Popiel (24 January 1936 – 17 February 2020) was a Polish actor. He mostly appeared on stage, but sometimes acted on screen. His stage credits include Wesoły telewizor, Kariera Nikodema Dyzmy, Madame Sans-Gene, Fiddler on the Roof, Pan Tadeusz and Fiddler on the Roof. On screen, he acted in Smażalnia story, Na kłopoty Bednarski, Lokatorzy, Sąsiedzi and Outlanders. Popiel was born in Kraków. On 17 February 2020, he died in Gdynia at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== *Andrzej Popiel at FilmPolski.pl Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Actors from Kraków
title: Andrzej Popiel
